name: Dormitorium
description:
Escape from the dorm and don't let the shadows take you. How to play:

-Press "WASD" to move.

-Press "E" to interact.

-Press "ESC" to pause the game.

-Find the items to escape from the dorm.

-Find the flames to add time and remove the shadows around you.

This game was made during the IUDAV Game Jam 2021. We didn't manage to fiinish the project in time so, after a year, I decided to complete it and put it here on itch.io.

I hope you have fun! If you want, you can leave a comment and share your feedback.
